<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Informações InfoTI">656728052f423110c4532aa62799b6d8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:df19ec452f423110c4532aa62799b62c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>on Change Assunto</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
     var subcategoria = g_form.getValue('subcategoria');
    if (subcategoria === "Ambiente Trabalho - Endpoint") {
        // Show the 'informacao_mensal_ou_trimestral' field
        g_form.setVisible('servidores_de_dependencia', true);
    }
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-26 21:52:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ee640fb22fc63110c4532aa62799b677</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>on Change Assunto</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Informações InfoTI" source="x_744286_informaco">67cad4c52f023110c4532aa62799b60b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Informações InfoTI">67cad4c52f023110c4532aa62799b60b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ee640fb22fc63110c4532aa62799b677</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-12 16:27:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
